articles.description: Ian Higton takes a look at the 7 Best PSVR 2 launch titles that you should buy if you’re a complete VR beginner!
articles.content: With the impending release of Sony's PSVR 2 headset, there are sure to be plenty of people out there who are about to indulge in the wonders of virtual reality for the very first time. If that sounds… [+12272 chars]
